headline: Vistra (VST) Is Up 5.2% After Record PJM Capacity Payouts Highlight AI-Driven Power Demand Shift
summary: PJM Interconnection has now confirmed record-breaking capacity payments totaling about US$17.00 billion for 2027, a decision expected to substantially reward power generators such as Vistra amid tight grid conditions and rising data center demand. This reinforces Vistra’s role as a key independent producer positioned to supply the growing electricity needs of AI infrastructure while also facing questions around recent insider share sales. We’ll now examine how these record PJM capacity...

headline: Gold Hits Record as Bitcoin, AI Stocks Slide
summary: The price of gold rallied to a record on Wednesday, as Wall Street was in no mood for risk-taking. Front-month gold settled at $4,347.50 an ounce, which is its first record settlement since Oct. 20, according to Dow Jones Market Data.

raw.headline: Gold Hits Record as Bitcoin, AI Stocks Slide
raw.summary: The price of gold rallied to a record on Wednesday, as Wall Street was in no mood for risk-taking. Front-month gold settled at $4,347.50 an ounce, which is its first record settlement since Oct. 20, according to Dow Jones Market Data.

headline: Nasdaq Slides. Why AI Stocks Are Falling Again.
summary: The Nasdaq Composite took a plunge on Wednesday amid a flurry of selling among artificial intelligence and Big Tech stocks.  The Dow fell 110 points, or 0.2%, dragged down by Caterpillar and Nvidia.  Utility stocks tied to the AI trade like Constellation Energy and Vistra were down more than 5%.

raw.headline: Nasdaq Slides. Why AI Stocks Are Falling Again.

headline: Has Vistra’s Huge Multi Year Rally Left Value on the Table in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Vistra's massive run still has gas in the tank or if the easy money has already been made, you are not alone. The stock is up 5.2% over the last week and 15.9% year to date, on top of a 659.4% gain over 3 years and 962.3% over 5 years, although the last 30 days have cooled slightly with a modest 0.7% pullback. That kind of long term surge has been associated with Vistra's transformation into a leading integrated power producer. Investors have increasingly focused...
